name: eizen
description: Vector database backend Engine lib for ArchiveNet

scripts.proto:gen: npm run proto:clean && npx pbjs ./proto/hnsw_comm.proto -w commonjs -t static-module -o ./proto/hnsw_comm.js && npx pbts ./proto/hnsw_comm.js -o ./proto/hnsw_comm.d.ts && npx pbjs ./proto/request.proto -w commonjs -t static-module -o ./proto/request.js && npx pbts ./proto/request.js -o ./proto/request.d.ts
scripts.use-npm: rm -f pnpm-lock.yaml && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.use-pnpm: rm -f package-lock.json && rm -rf node_modules && pnpm install

author: Agasta
